Title: Makes a real property tax exemption for persons sixty-five years of age or over mandatory for school taxes; repealer
Summary: Makes a real property tax exemption for persons sixty-five years of age or over mandatory for school taxes; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง467-m, rpld ยง467 sub 2, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to making a real property tax exemption for persons sixty-five years of age or over mandatory for school taxes; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
